comments.body:
This seems to be a duplication of function in: fake_client_generator.go (above).
Can we make this a public method in go2idl (it seems useful)?

I didn't want go2idl to expose the glog dependency.  If you're OK with that, I could do.  Further evolution will erase a lot of the callers of this, as tags get more custom-parsed (e.g. deepcopy and conversion both move away from this in a later commit).
Yeah - I saw that a bunch of those are removed later. How many copies we end up with at the end?

Just 2 plus the fake, so 3.  The API we want here is just not "pretty" for a common lib, any yet it is duplicated in a few pkgs.  This is sort of common to Go, where "a little duplication is better than a little dependency".  I think that the other users of this will be eliminated as their codegen is cleaned up, too, so I think we should leave it as-is for now.  If you feel strongly, I can just move the OrDie func into the common lib.
